title: UK agrees tech deal with the US as Trump arrives for state visit
description: The “tech prosperity deal” will see the UK and US co-operate in areas including artificial intelligence, quantum computing and nuclear power. | ITV National News
content:
The UK and US have struck a tech deal which could bring billions of pounds of investment to Britain as President Donald Trump touches down for his state visit.

title: As AI tools reshape education, schools struggle with how to draw the line on cheating
description: The book report is now a thing of the past. Take-home tests and essays are becoming obsolete. title: AI-powered CRISPR could lead to faster gene therapies
description: Stanford Medicine researchers have developed an artificial intelligence tool to help scientists better plan gene-editing experiments. The technology, CRISPR-GPT, acts as a gene-editing "copilot" supported by AI to help researchers—even those unfamiliar with gene editing—generate designs, analyze data and troubleshoot design flaws.
content: Stanford Medicine researchers have developed an artificial intelligence tool to help scientists better plan gene-editing experiments. The technology, CRISPR-GPT, acts as a gene-editing "copilot" supported by AI to help researchers—even those unfamili... [6607 chars]

title: Machine learning unravels quantum atomic vibrations in materials
description: Caltech scientists have developed an artificial intelligence (AI)–based method that dramatically speeds up calculations of the quantum interactions that take place in materials. In new work, the group focuses on interactions among atomic vibrations, or phonons—interactions that govern a wide range of material properties, including heat transport, thermal expansion, and phase transitions. The new machine learning approach could be extended to compute all quantum interactions, potentially enabling encyclopedic knowledge about how particles and excitations behave in materials.

title: An AI model can forecast harmful solar winds days in advance
description: Scientists at NYU Abu Dhabi (NYUAD) have developed an artificial intelligence (AI) model that can forecast solar wind speeds up to four days in advance, significantly more accurately than current methods. The study is published in The Astrophysical Journal Supplement Series.

title: Aussie businesses are risking data in race to use AI
description: Small businesses are increasingly adopting artificial intelligence technology but many are exposing their own confidential information in free tools.
content:
One in three Australian businesses are using free artificial intelligence tools to boost their productivity, a report has found, and most are sharing confidential company data with the software despite the risks.

title: Real-time labour market info system in the works
description: The government will soon launch a labour market information system. Ministries of skill development and labour are jointly setting it up. The system will provide real-time data on jobs and skills. It aims to align India's workforce with industry demands. Data will be collected from various sources. Artificial intelligence will be used for analysis.
